articles.author: Vic Micolucci, Corley Peel
articles.title: Vaccine available to anyone 65+ starting Monday in Jacksonville - WJXT News4JAX
articles.description: Anyone 65 years old and above and any health care worker who has not yet received the COVID-19 vaccine can receive their first dose of the vaccine starting Monday in Jacksonville, according to the Florida Department of Health in Duval County.
